item.title: Cleanup
item.description: Remove the domain and cluster Remove the domainâ€™s ingress routes by using kubectl. $ kubectl delete ingressroute traefik-ingress-sample-domain1-admin-server -n sample-domain1-ns $ kubectl delete ingressroute traefik-ingress-sample-domain1-cluster-cluster-1 -n sample-domain1-ns $ kubectl delete ingressroute traefik-ingress-sample-domain2-cluster-cluster-1 -n sample-domain1-ns Use kubectl to delete the domain resource. $ kubectl delete domain sample-domain1 -n sample-domain1-ns Use kubectl to confirm that the WebLogic Server instance Pods and Domain are gone.
